alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 12:38PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pottawatomie County through 115 PM CDT... At 1238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Westmoreland, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Westmoreland and Blaine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
